about_the_game:
Experience the unexpected thrill of a household chore in the latest next-generation AAAAA simulation experience: Dishwashing Simulator. New ground has been broken in the simulation genre, with a never-before-seen level of detail in the act of washing dishes. Explore a simulated world where every dish matters and survival hinges on your ability to keep things clean. Navigate through a twisted cycle of chores, rewards, and mysteries as you uncover the secrets behind your menial tasks.

  • Immerse yourself in an emergent simulation where gameplay mechanics interact in unpredictable ways.
  • Engage with an immersive physical interaction system.
  • Explore "The Depths,"  a procedurally generated dungeon.
  • Run, hide, and learn to survive various anomalies.
  • Light automation mechanics
  • Construct your base and production line, optimizing your dishwashing operations.
  • Survive by managing food, water, and agriculture.
  • Research using scrap to gain buffs or upgrades.
  • Unravel a short, but cryptic narrative.
  • GAMBLING !

Heads up: Dishwashing Simulator is NOT a full-blown automation game! It is a short-ish (4-6 hours) narrative survival horror game with some lite automation mechanics; don't expect a deep tech tree and hundreds of hours of gameplay!

name: Dishwashing Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core™ i5-4570 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Although the game is playable on lower-end systems, its physics-based nature means that an increase in complexity may lead to reduced performance towards the end of the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: i7 7700k / AMD Ryzen 2700x
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A short, unique survival-farming-base-building-tycoon-horror game where you must survive through washing dishes. Explore mysterious depths, manage resources, and unravel a cryptic narrative. In DWS, a chore becomes a journey to freedom.
